nft_backend.init_arg: (record { name = "Simple NFT"; symbol = "SNFT"; description = opt "A simple ICRC-7/ICRC-37 NFT collection"; supply_cap = null; test = opt true })

dominion_nft_backend.init_arg: (record { name = "Dominion Land"; symbol = "DLAND"; description = opt "Land ownership NFT for Dominion realm"; supply_cap = opt 10000 : opt nat; test = opt false })

agora_nft_backend.init_arg: (record { name = "Agora Land"; symbol = "ALAND"; description = opt "Land ownership NFT for Agora realm"; supply_cap = opt 10000 : opt nat; test = opt false })

syntropia_nft_backend.init_arg: (record { name = "Syntropia Land"; symbol = "SLAND"; description = opt "Land ownership NFT for Syntropia realm"; supply_cap = opt 10000 : opt nat; test = opt false })
